info.title: Musicgpt API
info.description: API for retrieving conversion details by ID.

get.description: Retrieve details of a conversion using `task_id` or `conversion_id`.

parameters.name: conversionType
parameters.description: The type of Conversion you want to get your details from.

parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description:
Task ID associated with the conversion. 
 **Note:** You must provide either `task_id` or `conversion_id`, but not both.

parameters.name: conversion_id
parameters.description:
Conversion ID to fetch details. 
 **Note:** You must provide either `task_id` or `conversion_id`, but not both.

get.description: Search for voices to get their voice ID by their names using a query string.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search string to filter voices by name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of voices per page

get.description: Fetch all available voices with their IDs.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of voices per page

post.description: Create music powered by AI using just a prompt, lyrics, or a defined music style.

prompt.description: A natural language prompt for music generation

music_style.description: Style of music to generate (e.g., Rock, Pop)

lyrics.description: Custom lyrics for the generated music

voice_id.description: Voice model to convert generated audio

post.summary: Convert voice from audio file or URL
post.description: Convert the voice from an audio file or URL to a different voice.

audio_url.description: URL of audio file to process

remove_background.description: 1 to remove background noise, 0 to keep

example.error: The file could not be downloaded from the provided URL
Both audio_url and audio_file cannot be None

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.musicgpt.com/api/public/v1/VoiceChanger"

payload = {
    "audio_url": "<string>",
    "voice_id": "<string>",
    "remove_background": "<int>",
    "pitch": "<int>",
    "webhook_url": "<string>"
}

# For file upload instead of URL:
# files = {'audio_file': open('filepath', 'rb')}

headers = {
    "Authorization": "<API Key>"
}

response = requests.post(url, data=payload, headers=headers)
# For file upload:
# response = requests.post(url, data=payload, files=files, headers=headers)

print(response.text)

<?php
$url = "https://api.musicgpt.com/api/public/v1/VoiceChanger";
$apiKey = "<API_KEY>";

// For URL-based processing
$data = [
    "audio_url" => "<AUDIO_URL>",
    "voice_id" => "<VOICE_ID>",
    "remove_background" => 0, // 0 or 1
    "pitch" => 0, // -12 to +12
    "webhook_url" => "<WEBHOOK_URL>"
];

// For file upload (uncomment and replace)
// $data = ["voice_id" => "<VOICE_ID>"];
// $file = new CURLFile('path/to/audio.wav', 'audio/wav', 'audio_file');

$headers = [
    "Authorization: " . $apiKey
];

$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
// For file upload:
// curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, array_merge($data, ['audio_file' => $file]));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);

$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

echo $response;
?>

post.description: Convert an audio file or URL into a cover song using a different voice.

audio_url.description: URL of an audio file to process. Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process. Either audio_file or audio_url must be provided.

voice_id.description: The ID of the voice model to use for voice transformation.

pitch.description: Pitch adjustment for the voice. Range from -12 to 12. Default: 0

webhook_url.description: A URL where the result will be sent once processing is completed.

example.error: The file could not be downloaded from the provided URL
Both audio_url and audio_file cannot be None

post.summary: Convert text to speech using a specified voice
post.description: Synthesize speech from text with voice and gender customization, plus optional webhook callback.

post.summary: Extract data from an audio file or URL
post.description: Initiate an audio extraction task using a file upload or a URL with optional webhook callback.

audio_url.description: The URL of the audio file to extract from.

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process.

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
package main

import (
    "bytes"
    "fmt"
    "io"
    "mime/multipart"
    "net/http"
    "os"
)

func main() {
    body := &bytes.Buffer{}
    writer := multipart.NewWriter(body)

    file, _ := os.Open("path_to_audio.mp3")
    part, _ := writer.CreateFormFile("audio_file", "path_to_audio.mp3")
    io.Copy(part, file)
    writer.WriteField("webhook_url", "http://webhook.musicgpt.com")
    writer.Close()

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", "https://api.musicgpt.com/api/public/v1/Extraction", body)
    req.Header.Add("Authorization", "<API_KEY>")
    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, _ := client.Do(req)
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    responseBody, _ := io.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    fmt.Println(string(responseBody))
}

post.summary: Separate stems data from an audio file or URL
post.description: Initiate an stems separation task using a file upload or a URL with optional webhook callback.

audio_url.description: The URL of the audio file to separate stems from.

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process.

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
package main

import (

    writer.WriteField("webhook_url", "http://webhook.musicgpt.com")
    writer.Close()

    req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", "https://api.musicgpt.com/api/public/v1/stems_separation", body)
    req.Header.Add("Authorization", "<API_KEY>")
    req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())

    client := &http.Client{}
    resp, _ := client.Do(req)
    defer resp.Body.Close()

    responseBody, _ := io.ReadAll(resp.Body)
    fmt.Println(string(responseBody))

post.summary: Remove echo from an audio file or URL
post.description: Initiate an echo removal task using either an audio URL or file upload with optional webhook callback.

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to process (e.g., YouTube, direct audio link).

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process directly.

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/deecho"
headers = {"Authorization": "<API_KEY>", "accept": "application/json"}

# Option 1: URL
response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json={"audio_url": "https://example.com/audio.m4a"})

# Option 2: File Upload
with open("audio.m4a", "rb") as f:
    files = {"audio_file": f}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, files=files)

print(response.json())

<?php
$url = 'https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/deecho';
$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json'];

// Option 1: URL
$data = ['audio_url' => 'https://example.com/audio.m4a'];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

// Option 2: File Upload
$data = ['audio_file' => new CURLFile('audio.m4a')];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"mime/multipart"
	"net/http"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	url := "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/deecho"
	token := "<API_KEY>"

	// Option 1: URL
	payload := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte(`{"audio_url":"https://example.com/audio.m4a"}`))
	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

	// Option 2: File Upload
	file, _ := os.Open("audio.m4a")
	defer file.Close()
	bodyBuf := &bytes.Buffer{}
	writer := multipart.NewWriter(bodyBuf)
	part, _ := writer.CreateFormFile("audio_file", "audio.m4a")
	io.Copy(part, file)
	writer.Close()
	req, _ = http.NewRequest("POST", url, bodyBuf)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())
	res, _ = http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ = io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))
}

post.summary: Removes noise from an audio file or URL
post.description: Initiate a noise removal task using either an audio URL or file upload with optional webhook callback.

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to process (e.g., YouTube, direct audio link).

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process directly.

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/denoise"
headers = {"Authorization": "<API_KEY>", "accept": "application/json"}

# Option 1: URL
response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json={"audio_url": "https://example.com/audio.m4a"})

# Option 2: File Upload
with open("audio.m4a", "rb") as f:
    files = {"audio_file": f}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, files=files)

print(response.json())

<?php

$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json'];

// Option 1: URL
$data = ['audio_url' => 'https://example.com/audio.m4a'];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

// Option 2: File Upload

$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"mime/multipart"
	"net/http"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	url := "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/denoise"
	token := "<API_KEY>"

	// Option 1: URL
	payload := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte(`{"audio_url":"https://example.com/audio.m4a"}`))
	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

	// Option 2: File Upload
	file, _ := os.Open("audio.m4a")
	defer file.Close()
	bodyBuf := &bytes.Buffer{}
	writer := multipart.NewWriter(bodyBuf)
	part, _ := writer.CreateFormFile("audio_file", "audio.m4a")
	io.Copy(part, file)
	writer.Close()
	req, _ = http.NewRequest("POST", url, bodyBuf)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())
	res, _ = http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()

post.summary: Removes reverberation from an audio file or URL

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to process (e.g., YouTube, direct audio link).

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process directly.

post.summary: Extract Key, BPM, and Key Changes from Audio
post.description: Processes an audio file to extract key changes, dominant key, and BPM (Beats Per Minute).

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to process (e.g., YouTube, direct audio link).

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process directly.

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/extract_key_bpm"
headers = {"Authorization": "<API_KEY>", "accept": "application/json"}

# Option 1: URL
response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json={"audio_url": "https://example.com/audio.m4a"})

# Option 2: File Upload
with open("audio.m4a", "rb") as f:
    files = {"audio_file": f}
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, files=files)

print(response.json())

<?php
$url = 'https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/extract_key_bpm';
$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json'];

// Option 1: URL
$data = ['audio_url' => 'https://example.com/audio.m4a'];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

// Option 2: File Upload
$data = ['audio_file' => new CURLFile('audio.m4a')];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"

	"mime/multipart"
	"net/http"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	url := "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/extract_key_bpm"
	token := "<API_KEY>"

	// Option 1: URL
	payload := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte(`{"audio_url":"https://example.com/audio.m4a"}`))
	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)

	writer := multipart.NewWriter(bodyBuf)
	part, _ := writer.CreateFormFile("audio_file", "audio.m4a")
	io.Copy(part, file)

	req, _ = http.NewRequest("POST", url, bodyBuf)

	req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())
	res, _ = http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ = io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))
}

post.description: Processes an audio file to generate a transcription of the spoken content with support for language detection, translation, and multiple output formats.

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to transcribe.

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and process directly.

language.description: Language spoken in the audio (empty for auto-detection).

translate.description: Whether to translate the transcription to English.

transcription_format.description: Format of the transcribed output (plain_text, formatted_text, srt, vtt).

translation_format.description: Format of the translated output (currently unused).

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/transcribe"
headers = {"Authorization": "<API_KEY>", "accept": "application/json"}

# Option 1: URL with parameters
payload = {
    "audio_url": "https://example.com/audio.mp3",
    "language": "en",
    "translate": True,
    "transcription_format": "srt",
    "word_timestamps": True
}
response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload)

# Option 2: File Upload
with open("audio.mp3", "rb") as f:
    files = {"audio_file": f}
    data = {
        "language": "en",
        "translate": False,
        "transcription_format": "plain_text"
    }
    response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, files=files, data=data)

print(response.json())

<?php
$url = 'https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/transcribe';
$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json'];

// Option 1: URL
$data = [
    'audio_url' => 'https://example.com/audio.mp3',
    'language' => 'en',
    'translate' => true,
    'transcription_format' => 'srt'
];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

// Option 2: File Upload
$data = [
    'audio_file' => new CURLFile('audio.mp3'),
    'language' => 'en',
    'word_timestamps' => true
];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"mime/multipart"
	"net/http"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	url := "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/transcribe"
	token := "<API_KEY>"

	// Option 1: URL with parameters
	payload := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte(`{
		"audio_url": "https://example.com/audio.mp3",
		"language": "en",
		"translate": true,
		"transcription_format": "vtt"
	}`))
	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

	// Option 2: File Upload
	file, _ := os.Open("audio.mp3")
	defer file.Close()
	bodyBuf := &bytes.Buffer{}
	writer := multipart.NewWriter(bodyBuf)
	part, _ := writer.CreateFormFile("audio_file", "audio.mp3")
	io.Copy(part, file)
	writer.WriteField("language", "en")
	writer.WriteField("word_timestamps", "true")
	writer.Close()
	req, _ = http.NewRequest("POST", url, bodyBuf)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())
	res, _ = http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ = io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))
}

post.summary: Generate Sound Based on Given Prompt
post.description: Creates an audio file based on a textual prompt. The generation process is asynchronous and returns a task ID for tracking.

prompt.description: Text prompt guiding the sound generation.

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

prompt.description: Text prompt guiding the sound generation.

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

error.example: Prompt is required for sound generation.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = 'https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/generate_sound';
$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json', 'Content-Type: application/json'];

$data = [
    'prompt' => 'Generate a soothing ambient soundscape.',
    'webhook_url' => 'http://your-webhook-url.com/callback'
];

$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode($data));
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

echo $response;

package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"net/http"
)

func main() {
	url := "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/generate_sound"
	token := "<API_KEY>"

	payload := []byte(`{
		"prompt": "Generate a soothing ambient soundscape.",
		"webhook_url": "http://your-webhook-url.com/callback"
	}`)

	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, bytes.NewBuffer(payload))
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	req.Header.Add("Content-Type", "application/json")

	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))
}

post.summary: Master an audio file using a reference track
post.description: Processes an audio file to match the mastering characteristics of a reference track.

audio_path.description: URL path of the input audio file to be mastered

reference_audio_path.description: URL path of the reference audio file to match

conversion_id.description: Unique identifier for this conversion request

audio_duration.description: Duration of input audio in seconds

webhook_url.description: URL to receive callback notification when processing completes

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

headers = {"Authorization": "<API_KEY>", "accept": "application/json"}

    "audio_path": "https://example.com/input_audio.mp3",
    "reference_audio_path": "https://example.com/reference_track.wav",

    "audio_duration": 180.5,

}

print(response.json())

post.description: Processes an audio file and converts it into a MIDI file. Optionally, it can also generate a sonified .wav file and a CSV of note events. This request is handled asynchronously.

audio_path.description: The S3 path of the input audio file to convert

sonify_midi.description: If true, generates a .wav file that sonifies the MIDI output

save_note_events.description: If true, saves predicted note events as a CSV

webhook_url.description: URL to receive callback when the MIDI conversion is complete

post.summary: Create a remix using an input audio file and a prompt
post.description: This endpoint processes an input audio file or audio path along with a textual prompt to generate a remix. The remix type is specified using the `mode` parameter. The task is queued and responds with task ID, ETA, credit estimate, and status message.

mode.description: The type of remix to perform.

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and use for remixing.

audio_path.description: Path to S3 or YouTube link used to generate the audio.

prompt.description: The text prompt that guides the remix or sound generation.

lyrics.description: Optional lyrics to guide the generation.
lyrics.example: Floating in a sea of dreams

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results.

error.example: Either audio_file or audio_path must be provided.

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = 'https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/remix';
$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json'];

// Option 1: URL
$data = [
  'mode' => 'REMIX',
  'prompt' => 'Generate a soothing ambient soundscape.',
  'audio_path' => 'https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=example123'
];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

// Option 2: File Upload
$data = [
  'mode' => 'REMIX',
  'prompt' => 'Generate a soothing ambient soundscape.',
  'audio_file' => new CURLFile('audio.m4a')
];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

post.summary: Convert audio file to different format
post.description: Initiate a file conversion task using either an audio URL or file upload with optional format parameters and webhook callback.

audio_url.description: URL of the audio file to convert

audio_file.description: Audio file to upload and convert directly

webhook_url.description: Callback URL for async processing results

error.example: Either audio_url or audio_file must be provided

x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$url = 'https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/file_convert';
$headers = ['Authorization: <API_KEY>', 'accept: application/json'];

// Option 1: URL
$data = [
    'audio_url' => 'https://example.com/audio.mp3',
    'target_format' => 'wav',
    'target_sr' => 44100,
    'webhook_url' => 'http://your-webhook-url.com/callback'
];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

// Option 2: File Upload
$data = [
    'audio_file' => new CURLFile('audio.mp3'),
    'target_format' => 'flac',
    'target_bit_depth' => 24
];
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, $headers);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"mime/multipart"
	"net/http"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	url := "https://api.example.com/api/public/v1/file_convert"
	token := "<API_KEY>"

	// Option 1: URL
	payload := bytes.NewBuffer([]byte(`{
		"audio_url": "https://example.com/audio.mp3",
		"target_format": "wav",
		"target_sr": 44100
	}`))
	req, _ := http.NewRequest("POST", url, payload)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("accept", "application/json")
	res, _ := http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ := io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))

	// Option 2: File Upload
	file, _ := os.Open("audio.mp3")
	defer file.Close()
	bodyBuf := &bytes.Buffer{}
	writer := multipart.NewWriter(bodyBuf)
	part, _ := writer.CreateFormFile("audio_file", "audio.mp3")
	io.Copy(part, file)
	writer.WriteField("target_format", "flac")
	writer.WriteField("target_bit_depth", "24")
	writer.Close()
	req, _ = http.NewRequest("POST", url, bodyBuf)
	req.Header.Add("Authorization", token)
	req.Header.Add("Content-Type", writer.FormDataContentType())
	res, _ = http.DefaultClient.Do(req)
	defer res.Body.Close()
	body, _ = io.ReadAll(res.Body)
	fmt.Println(string(body))
}
